title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 21 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 21 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: The king's heart is in the hand of the LORD, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.
lineList.cn: 王的心在耶和华手中，好像陇沟的水，随意流转。

lineList.en: Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the LORD pondereth the hearts.
lineList.cn: 人所行的，在自己的眼中都看为正，惟有耶和华衡量人心。

lineList.en: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the LORD than sacrifice.
lineList.cn: 行仁义公平，比献祭更蒙耶和华悦纳。

lineList.en: An high look, and a proud heart, and the plowing of the wicked, is sin.
lineList.cn: 恶人发达，眼高心傲，这乃是罪。（发达原文是灯）

lineList.en: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.
lineList.cn: 殷勤筹画的，足致丰裕。行事急躁的，都必缺乏。

lineList.en: The getting of treasures by a lying tongue is a vanity tossed to and fro of them that seek death.
lineList.cn: 用诡诈之舌求财的，就是自己取死。所得之财，乃是吹来吹去的浮云。

lineList.en: The robbery of the wicked shall destroy them; because they refuse to do judgment.
lineList.cn: 恶人的强暴，必将自己扫除。因他们不肯按公平行事。

lineList.en: The way of man is froward and strange: but as for the pure, his work is right.
lineList.cn: 负罪之人的路，甚是弯曲。至于清洁的人，他所行的乃是正直。

lineList.en: It is better to dwell in a corner of the housetop, than with a brawling woman in a wide house.
lineList.cn: 宁可住在房顶的角上，不在宽阔的房屋，与争吵的妇人同住。

lineList.en: The soul of the wicked desireth evil: his neighbour findeth no favour in his eyes.
lineList.cn: 恶人的心，乐人受祸。他眼并不怜恤邻舍。

lineList.en: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.
lineList.cn: 亵慢的人受刑罚，愚蒙的人就得智慧。智慧人受训诲，便得知识。

lineList.en: The righteous man wisely considereth the house of the wicked: but God overthroweth the wicked for their wickedness.
lineList.cn: 义人思想恶人的家，知道恶人倾倒，必至灭亡。

lineList.en: Whoso stoppeth his ears at the cry of the poor, he also shall cry himself, but shall not be heard.
lineList.cn: 塞耳不听穷人哀求的，他将来呼吁也不蒙应允。

lineList.en: A gift in secret pacifieth anger: and a reward in the bosom strong wrath.
lineList.cn: 暗中送的礼物，挽回怒气。怀中搋的贿赂，止息暴怒。

lineList.en: It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
lineList.cn: 秉公行义，使义人喜乐，使作孽的人败坏。

lineList.en: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.
lineList.cn: 迷离通达道路的，必住在阴魂的会中。

lineList.en: He that loveth pleasure shall be a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich.
lineList.cn: 爱宴乐的，必致穷乏。好酒爱膏油的，必不富足。

lineList.en: The wicked shall be a ransom for the righteous, and the transgressor for the upright.
lineList.cn: 恶人作了义人的赎价。奸诈人代替正直人。

lineList.en: It is better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and an angry woman.
lineList.cn: 宁可住在旷野，不与争吵使气的妇人同住。

lineList.en: There is treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.
lineList.cn: 智慧人家中积蓄宝物膏油。愚昧人随得来随吞下。

lineList.en: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.
lineList.cn: 追求公义仁慈的，就寻得生命，公义，和尊荣。

lineList.en: A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.
lineList.cn: 智慧人爬上勇士的城墙，倾覆他所倚靠的坚垒。

lineList.en: Whoso keepeth his mouth and his tongue keepeth his soul from troubles.
lineList.cn: 谨守口与舌的，就保守自己免受灾难。

lineList.en: Proud and haughty scorner is his name, who dealeth in proud wrath.
lineList.cn: 心骄气傲的人，名叫亵慢。他行事狂妄，都出于骄傲。

lineList.en: The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.
lineList.cn: 懒惰人的心愿，将他杀害，因为他手不肯作工。

lineList.en: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.
lineList.cn: 有终日贪得无厌的，义人施舍而不吝惜。

lineList.en: The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind?
lineList.cn: 恶人的祭物是可憎的，何况他存恶意来献呢。

lineList.en: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.
lineList.cn: 作假见证的必灭亡，惟有听真情而言的，其言长存。

lineList.en: A wicked man hardeneth his face: but as for the upright, he directeth his way.
lineList.cn: 恶人脸无羞耻，正直人行事坚定。

lineList.en: There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the LORD.
lineList.cn: 没有人能以智慧，聪明，谋略，敌挡耶和华。

lineList.en: The horse is prepared against the day of battle: but safety is of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 马是为打仗之日豫备的。得胜乃在乎耶和华。
